name: VSTSSitecoreShipPublishTask
description: Helps you publish .update files to a Sitecore instance from Powershell assuming you are using the Sitecore.Ship module
author: stevevandenbush

inputs.name: SiteUrl
inputs.label: Site Url (include http/https)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Url for the site you are installing the .update package on (ex: _http://mysite.dev_)

inputs.name: PublishTargets
inputs.label: Publish Targets
inputs.helpMarkDown: The db targets for the publish, comma delimited (ex: _preview, web_)

inputs.name: PublishLanguages
inputs.label: Publish Languages
inputs.helpMarkDown: The language targets for the publish, comma delimited (ex: _en_)

inputs.name: PublishMode
inputs.label: Publish Mode
inputs.helpMarkDown: The publish mode (ex: smart, full, incremental or listofitems)

inputs.name: ListOfIDsInputPath
inputs.label: List of Item IDs Input file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of the flat file (with just IDs) to use with the _listofitems_ publish type

inputs.name: Password
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Insert Password here, also suggested that in order to keep password hidden, use _$(secretVariable)_ instead of plain text
